data.eml:eml: A new Zoropsis species from China, with notes on Zoropsis pekingensis Schenkel, 1953 (Araneae, Zoropsidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Zhiyue, Hu, Lanlan, Zhang, Feng (2015): A new Zoropsis species from China, with notes on Zoropsis pekingensis Schenkel, 1953 (Araneae, Zoropsidae). Zootaxa 3981 (3): 444-450, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3981.3.10
